pages.text: And We sent to Thamud their brother Salih, [saying], "Worship God," but they were split into rival factions
He said, "My people, why are you so anxious to rush towards evil instead of to good? Why you do not ask God for forgiveness, so that maybe you will receive mercy
They said, "We consider you to be a bad omen, you and those with you." He said, "Your omen is with God. Rather, it is you who are being tested
And in the town there were heads of nine clans who spread mischief in the land and did no good

They said to each other, "Let's take an oath by God that we will kill him and his family tonight. Then we will say to his protector, 'we did not witness the destruction of his family, and we are truthful
So they devised their plan, and We too had a plan, but they were not aware of what We were planning
Look, then, at the outcome of their plan: We destroyed them and all their people
Here are their houses, desolate because they were unjust. There is a sign in that for people who know
And We saved those who believed and were mindful of God
And Lot, when he said to his people, "How can you commit this indecent act with your eyes wide open
You lust after men instead of women? You are ignorant people
